title: ACE Engineering College: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Placements, Rankings
meta_description: ACE Engineering College Admission 2024 is open for various degree programs based on TS EAMCET and other entrance exam scores. Check latest updates and news on ACE Engineering CollegeAdmission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Eligibility, and Admission Process
keywords: ACE Engineering College Admission 2024, ACE Engineering College B.Tech Admission 2024, ACE Engineering College Cutoff 2024, ACE Engineering College Courses Admission 2024, ACE Engineering College Cutoff, ACE Engineering College Fees, ACE Engineering College Admission Cutoff 2024, How much rank to get admission in ACE Engineering College, ACE Engineering College Admission Updates

basic_info.name: ACE Engineering College Courses and Fees
description: The ACE Engineering College offers a full-time and 4-year duration Bachelor of Technology course at the UG level and in 10 specializations. In addition, under the Butterfly program, students are provided a different set of training each year. For instance, in 1st year, girl students are trained in 20+ technologies, competitive programming, and Business English.

In the 2nd and 3rd years, students are trained in advanced quantitative, Reasoning, and Verbal Abilities followed by behavioral skills, Java, and Data Structure and Algorithms. In addition, they get to study through PEGA Certification courses, CISCO, Cybersecurity, and AWS Training, training for coding challenges like Infosys-Infytq, Hackwith Infy, TCS-Codevita, etc. Last but not least, in the final year, company-specific training sessions are arranged for students.
Read More: ACE Engineering College Courses

basic_info.name: ACE Engineering College Admission
description: The process followed by the ACE Engineering College to grant admission to students in its courses is well-defined and has multiple steps in it. Seats of the B.Tech courses are filled under 2 categories namely Category A (filled by the Convener of EAMCET) and Category B i.e. Management Quota.
How to Apply?
Read More: ACE Engineering College Admission 2024

basic_info.name: ACE Engineering College Facilities
description: The highly vibrant, lively, and technology-integrated campus of ACE Engineering College is situated on a large area of land. Additionally, the overall ambiance is truly suitable for faculty and students' learning and growth. Further, lush greenery surrounding the college enhances its beauty. The following are some of the key facilities the college has for its students and staff members.

Advanced Classrooms: The ACE Engineering College has well-developed, interactive, and ventilated lecture halls on its campus. All the classrooms are well-resourced with comfortable seating arrangements, internet, multimedia projectors, audio-video devices, and enough lighting.

Seminar Hall and Auditorium: A cutting-edge seminar hall and auditorium also exist on the college premises. These places are used during events such as Seminars, Expert lectures, Project Presentations, Orientation Sessions, Conferences, etc. All facilities such as a public speaking system, projectors, internet connectivity, audio-video systems, etc. are available here. The Auditorium has a seating capacity of 1500+ people while Seminar Hall can accommodate 500+ people at a time.

Central Library: The ACE Engineering College has a huge Knowledge Center situated over an area of 1073.52 sq. m. The library hosts an extensively rich collection of nearly 42,759 books covering a wide range of Engineering disciplines, competitive exams books, and 108 periodicals followed by international & national journals in domains like core engineering, Management, entrepreneurship, humanities, and soft skills. In addition, 3555 CD ROMS are available in the library. Lastly, the reference section of the library is home to standard textbooks for use by both students and faculty.

Computer Lab: This well-equipped facility aims to enhance the digital competency of young minds. The lab has 400 computers in total with dual operating systems. The availability of WI-FI further allows students to access a variety of online content including e-journals and e-books, conduct online research, and finish assignments and projects.
Canteen: A big and fully-furnished canteen has been built by the college to provide hygienic, nutritious, and fresh food items and snacks to students and staff members at a reasonable price.

Transport: The college has a fleet of vehicles to offer pickup and drop facilities to students and staff members from the nearby locations of Hyderabad. All the vehicles are driven by trained individuals.

Accommodations: The college strongly believes that students coming from a different city or state must receive a home-like ambiance away from their homes. Hence, separate hostel facilities are offered to both boys and girls. These accommodations are resourced with all facilities like clean and spacious rooms, 24*7 electricity and water supply, mess for food, recreational space, and Wi-Fi. The security of students is monitored via CCTV cameras and security guards around the clock.
Check: ACE Engineering College Reviews

basic_info.name: ACE Engineering College Placement
description: There is a dedicated Training and Placement Cell at ACE Engineering College and the primary job of this cell is to work closely with recruiters to understand their requirements and guide students for skills enhancement. Another key task of this cell is to arrange mock interviews, group discussions, pre-placement talks, training programs, and take care of recruitment drives. In terms of infrastructure, the cell comprises 12 air-conditioned interview panel rooms and 5 air-conditioned GD rooms. eLitmus, Amcat, and AON are the assessment partners of ACE Engineering College while uipath Academy, DXC Technologies, Salesforce, Cisco, and Pega provide specialized training to students. Given below are some of the top recruiters and package details secured by students.
Tabulated below are the total number of students placed during ACE Engineering College Placements 2024

basic_info.name: Note: Students can utilize either Hostel or Transport facility. Students cannot claim refunds for facilities not utilized by them. The above-mentioned facilities are not transferable.
How to reach ACE Engineering College?
description: The ACE Engineering College is located in Ankushapur, Ghatkesar Mandal, Medchal District, Hyderabad - 501301, Telangana, India. Students can reach here via different modes of transport as mentioned below.

Section.name: About ACEEC
Section.description:
ACE Engineering College is a well-developed, autonomous, and highly reputed college in Hyderabad. It was founded in 2007 by the Yadala Satyanarayana Memorial Educational Society. The college is approved by the All-India Council of Technical Education, accredited by NAAC with an A grade, and affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.
ACE Engineering College offers an Undergraduate program called B.Tech in multiple specializations. Admission is granted to students based on the merit of the last year’s qualifying exam. The score of candidates in entrance exams like EAMCET or JEE is also counted during the final selection. All the courses of ACE are NBA accredited.
ACE Engineering College Highlights
Read More: ACE Engineering College Faculty
The ACE Engineering College offers a full-time and 4-year duration Bachelor of Technology course at the UG level and in 10 specializations. In addition, under the Butterfly program, students are provided a different set of training each year. For instance, in 1st year, girl students are trained in 20+ technologies, competitive programming, and Business English.
In the 2nd and 3rd years, students are trained in advanced quantitative, Reasoning, and Verbal Abilities followed by behavioral skills, Java, and Data Structure and Algorithms. In addition, they get to study through PEGA Certification courses, CISCO, Cybersecurity, and AWS Training, training for coding challenges like Infosys-Infytq, Hackwith Infy, TCS-Codevita, etc. Last but not least, in the final year, company-specific training sessions are arranged for students.
Read More: ACE Engineering College Courses
The table given below shows ACEEC TS EAMCET Cutoff 2024 for Round 1.
The process followed by the ACE Engineering College to grant admission to students in its courses is well-defined and has multiple steps in it. Seats of the B.Tech courses are filled under 2 categories namely Category A (filled by the Convener of EAMCET) and Category B i.e. Management Quota.
How to Apply?

Ques. What measures does the ACE Engineering College have taken to ensure everyone's security on campus?
Ans. The whole campus of ACE Engineering College is equipped with CCTV cameras to monitor the movement of people and ensure everyone's safety.
Ques. Does ACE Engineering College offer sports and Gym facilities to students?
Ans. Yes, the ACE Engineering College has enough arrangements for various indoor and outdoor games. In addition, there is a full-fledged gym for students.
Ques. How can one contact the ACE Engineering College for admission-related queries?
Ans. For any query or issues related to enrollment, an individual can get in touch with the concerned authority at 8712225044 or they can drop their queries at admissions@aceec.ac.in.
